structure.unit: STATE AND REGIONAL MENTAL HEALTH PROGRAMS

law.catch_line: Meeting and duties of regional planning councils.

text.section: The regional planning councils shall meet as often as necessary to accomplish their purpose.

law.history: Amended 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 5, sec. 4, effective June 24, 2003. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 507, sec. 5, effective April 21, 2000.
